title: Are assassins evil or good? - Quora

response.answer_text: The job is neither good nor evil… its actually an exercise in apathy… The question is “ What is the hitters code… what is his ethics”… Wetwork is a job to a hitter… they can be eirher good or evil
If I said I had a contract to kill you, (and it turned out to be true) would you consider that good or evil. Work out your answer from there
